name: Frances Chvatal
statement_html:
Elected Experience
None

Other Professional Experience
A Registered Nurse for 37 years; 10 years spent providing direct patient care, 22 years in clinical leadership as the Director of Surgical Services at Providence St. Mary Medical Center and 5 years as a quality analyst. 

Education
BS Nursing, WSU, 1983.

Community Service
Currently serves on the Providence St. Mary Mission Board. Served as a lector at church services, a volunteer at the winter warming center and as a member of the Walla Walla Bicycle Pedestrian Advisory Council. 

Statement
Proud to be from Eastern Washington, Frances was born in Walla Walla and raised on a farm in Touchet. Frances will represent the people of the 16th Legislative District with integrity and honesty.  A Registered Nurse for 37 years, Frances has listened to thousands of people, she will listen to you.  Frances looks to science and data to make sound decisions mindful of economic impact.  Government derives its legitimacy from the people, to whom it must be answerable. As your Representative she will be an advocate for family farms, a healthy environment, quality healthcare and access to education.
